title: Billboard & Girls’ Generation Welcome You to K-Town! – Billboard
text:
Billboard.com's brand new K-pop column is officially here! K-Town will bring readers K-pop news, songs, and music videos each week. Not to mention, weekly chart articles on the Billboard Korea K-Pop… By
												

	Jeff Benjamin   Billboard.com’s brand new K-pop column is officially here! K-Town will bring readers K-pop news, songs, and music videos each week. Not to mention, weekly chart articles on the Billboard Korea K-Pop Hot 100 chart. Whether you’re a longtime K-pop fan or simply found yourself swept up in “Gangnam Style”-mania last year, this column will deliver content that is accessible and entertaining for all readers. The more one follows and interacts, the more they can learn and become immersed in the increasingly international world of K-pop. Not only will you have your weekly K-pop coverage, but like other genres, Billboard promises to bring top-notch exclusive content that goes above and beyond with interviews, photos and videos.  One of K-pop’s biggest acts, Girls’ Generation, shares this excitement and sent Billboard a congratulatory video for K-Town’s launch. Check it out above and stay tuned for exciting things from the biggest names this week and beyond. Related		
	

















	
	
		
					BTS' V Drops Two Very Different Remixes of 'Slow Dancing' Solo Single		
	



	01/29/2013
